means: 张大的，鼓胀的，柔软而膨松的

sentence.Network_en: Her short brown hair was curled in a puffy bouffant hairdo.
sentence.Network_cn: 她棕色的卷卷的短发蓬松鼓起.

sentence.Network_en: For example, in the late 1960 s women became tired of bouffant hairstyles and sought new looks.
sentence.Network_cn: 例如在20世纪60年代后期,妇女开始对蓬松的发型感到厌倦,开始追求新的形象.
